channel.title: John Weston
channel.description: Recent news about John Weston, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: In #Whistler with Cdn Trade Minister Ed Fast & BC Forestry Minister Steve Thomson - great 10th annual BC Wood Conf JW http://t.co/kfunGZJKYM

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: To kevin Thomson, Leslie Tomlinson & all others who will make Saturday's @GranFondoCanada a big success - congrats! http://t.co/P3kiXwooPq

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: With cdn Govt, I condemn attack on Camp #Ashraf in #Iraq, home of Iranian exiles. I visited Iraq in 2011; oh, for peace there! JW

item.title: Mentioned by North Shore Outlook
item.description:
North Shore MP campsout, listens to railway noise
... Shore MP campsout, listens to railway noise. Weston-Norgate.jpg. John Weston, MP for West Vancouver-Sunshine Coast-Sea to Sky Country (left), and Norgate resident Mike Haveruk discuss noise that comes from CN trains late at night. Michaela Garstin.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Who ever "tires" of "rolling" into #Squamish - part of the Most Beautiful Place on Earth? JW http://t.co/YH92wIUDq8

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: "Midnight Train" - Seeking balance b/w CN train whistling, safety & needs of Cdn householders - TV coverage: http://t.co/krOIHxS42f JW

item.title: Mentioned by Globalnews.ca
item.description:
North Vancouver MP spends night outside to check out train noise
On Saturday night, local MP John Weston who represents West Vancouver–Sunshine Coast–Sea to Sky Country, camped out to get a better idea of the problem. Residents say the real issue is with the train whistles, which sound off inconsistently throughout ...

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Congrats to Kerry & @GinnyDennehy 4 their amazing X-Canada ride to battle mental health problems - 4 all Cdns! JW http://t.co/JNGf4yReLZ

item.title: Mentioned by Bowen Island Undercurrent
item.description:
Bowen seniors get fit for life
Steamship Days offered many delightful surprises, one of which was a visit from John Weston, our Member of Parliament, who honoured four Bowen seniors with a Fit for Life certificate. To fight the growing obesity rate, which now makes Canada almost tied ...
